critique: The document is an executive order regarding labor-management relations within the Department of Justice. As the President, the primary goal is to ensure national security. The order aims to exempt certain subdivisions from the Federal Labor-Management Relations Program. The tone is formal and authoritative. The language is legal and precise. The context is national security.
